SETUP: : brown_town will play as USSR.
jonreb will play as USA.
Scenario: Standard
Time per Player: 45 Minutes
USSR +4 in Poland [0][4]
USSR +1 in East Germany [0][4]
USSR +1 in Austria [0][1]
US +4 in West Germany [4][0]
US +3 in Italy [3][0]

Turn 1, Headline Phase: Asia Scoring & Five Year Plan: USSR Headlines Asia Scoring
US Headlines Five Year Plan
Event: Five Year Plan
USSR discards Containment*
Event: Containment*
Containment* is now in play.


Event: Asia Scoring
USSR gains 1 VP. Score is USSR 1.


Turn 1, USSR AR1: Warsaw Pact Formed*: Coup (3 Ops):
Target: Iran
SUCCESS: 3 [ + 3 - 2x2 = 2 ]
US -1 in Iran [0][0]
USSR +1 in Iran [0][1]
USSR Military Ops to 3
DEFCON degrades to 4


Turn 1, US AR1: Olympic Games: Coup (3 Ops):
Target: Iran
SUCCESS: 6 [ + 3 - 2x2 = 5 ]
USSR -1 in Iran [0][0]
US +4 in Iran [4][0]
US Military Ops to 3
DEFCON degrades to 3


Turn 1, USSR AR2: Suez Crisis*: Place Influence (3 Ops):
USSR +1 in Afghanistan [0][1]
USSR +2 in Iraq [0][3]


Turn 1, US AR2: NATO*: Place Influence (4 Ops):
US +2 in Pakistan [2][0]
US +1 in Malaysia [1][0]
US +1 in Greece [1][0]


Turn 1, USSR AR3: Duck and Cover: Space Race (3 Ops):
Die roll: 1 -- Success! (Needed 3 or less)
USSR advances to 1 in the Space Race.
USSR gains 2 VP. Score is USSR 3.


Turn 1, US AR3: Blockade*: Coup (2 Ops):
Target: Iraq
SUCCESS: 5 [ + 2 - 2x3 = 1 ]
USSR -1 in Iraq [0][2]
US Military Ops to 5
DEFCON degrades to 2

Event: Blockade*
US discards Socialist Governments

USSR +1 in Lebanon [0][1]

US gains 1 VP. Score is USSR 2.
